title: Editing Sessions: Lighting up London by Mike Will
description: Get the most out of your smartphone camera with this range of simple tutorials from a selection of the UK's top technology influencers

components.copy: Lighting up London by Mike Will

text: Welcome to the Editing Sessions. A chance to learn tips from the professionals on how to get the most out of your smartphone camera.

Leading content creator and photography extraordinaire Mike Will shares his techniques to capturing long exposures in Londonâ€™s night sky. Using the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE pro mode function, Mike teaches everything from device set up to the perfect positioning for that colourful light trail shot.
